title: SaNmukha sundaranai
sahitya:
SaNmukha sundaranai cendUril daishittu deNDaniTTOr paDum tuyar tIrndiDumE


anupallavi

  viNNavar sirai mINDu ponnnulagil mun pOl kaNNiya vAzhvaip-pera karuNai kUrndavan


caraNam    nondOr tannaDi nADi cendUr tEDi vandu kandA kandA enru kadarit-tam kurai tIra
vandanai purindadum cintai kanindavarai santOSam eidiDa sheidu sirandiDum
